perturbation.original_text: B.   You receive a Designated Area within which we and our affiliates shall not operate or grant to anyone else a franchise to operate a Buffalo Wild Wings or bw-3 Restaurant so long as this Agreement is in force and effect.  The Designated Area is described in writing and on a map attached to the Agreement as EXHIBIT B and is made a part of the Agreement.  You do not have any right to sublicense or subfranchise others within or outside of the Designated Area and do not have the right to operate more than one (1) Franchised Restaurant within the Designated Area.
perturbation.changed_text: B.   You receive a Designated Area within which we and our affiliates shall not operate or grant to anyone else a franchise to operate a Buffalo Wild Wings or bw-3 Restaurant so long as this Agreement is in force and effect.  The Designated Area is described in writing and on a map attached to the Agreement as EXHIBIT B and is made a part of the Agreement.  You may have the right to sublicense or subfranchise others within the Designated Area depending on negotiations between you and the Franchisor, which will be determined on a case-by-case basis. You do not have the right to operate more than one (1) Franchised Restaurant within the Designated Area, unless the Franchisor permits it.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly stated the franchisee does *not* have the right to sublicense. The modified version contradicts this by stating they *may* have the right to sublicense depending on negotiations, creating uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: D.   We shall give you written notice of our election not to renew the franchise at least three (3) months prior to the expiration of the initial or first renewal term of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: D.   We shall give you written notice of our election not to renew the franchise at least three (3) months prior to the expiration of the initial or first renewal term of this Agreement. However, this notice may be waived at the Franchisor's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated the Franchisor *shall* give written notice. The modified version introduces the Franchisor's discretion to *waive* that notice, which essentially negates the original statement and creates a contradiction.

perturbation.original_text: F.   You will pay us without offset, credit or deduction of any nature, so long as this Agreement is in effect, a monthly Continuing Fee equal to five percent (5%) of the Gross Sales derived from the Franchised Restaurant.  The Continuing Fee will be paid monthly in the manner specified below or as otherwise prescribed in the Manuals.
perturbation.changed_text: F.   You will pay us, possibly with offset, credit or deduction of any nature, so long as this Agreement is in effect, a monthly Continuing Fee that might be different than five percent (5%) of the Gross Sales derived from the Franchised Restaurant. The Continuing Fee will be paid monthly in a manner that may or may not specified below or as otherwise prescribed in the Manuals.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly defined the payment terms of *five percent*, *no deductions*, and following the manual; however, the revised version is a contradiction to that by having an *amount subject to change* that may or may not follow the *manner specified* below, introducing a large possibility of uncertainty.
